metadata.title: CVE-2021-1223 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Multiple Cisco products are affected by a vulnerability in the Snortdetection engine that could allow an unauthenticated, remote attacker tobypass a configured file policy for HTTP. The vulnerability is due toincorrect handling of an HTTP range header. An attacker could exploit thisvulnerability by sending crafted HTTP packets through an affected device. Asuccessful exploit could allow the attacker to bypass configured filepolicy for HTTP packets and deliver a malicious payload.

criterions.comment: snort package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
